Object Flight Path: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
divs: Sighting DetailsOn June 16, 2012, at 9:45 pm, over the horizon,(while sitting on a balcony at the jersey shore) I observed in the sky coming from the North, what I thought was a plane at first, but soon realized that what I saw could not be that. The object quickly changed directions, and moved faster, I knew that it could not be a plane. I observed the object follow this pattern going to the Northeast near the Big Dipper constellation. I watched it approx for 55 seconds, and it was long enough for me, to observe the object in the sky. I know my eyes were not playing tricks on me as I stared at this thing move out into space and get smaller and smaller. Shame I did not have a good video camera with a super zoom lens. Someone over NY, North Jersey, or even Northeast PA should have encountered this light. from my advantage or view - I would say it was close to philadelphia airport or Newark airport. --------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Summary: Bright Light with steady movement into the stars
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Brigantine
There were no other sightings in Brigantine on or around June 16th 2012
